text: gundaewa mallosseo neohuiga hal su issneun han geudeul-e daehanghal junbileul hala hasyeoss-euni geugeos-eulo hananim-ui jeoggwa neohuideul-ui jeogdeulgwa geudeul-oeui daleun wiseonjadeul-eul dulyeobge hala neo huineun geudeul-eul alji moshana hananim-eungeudeul-eul asim-iyo neohuiga hananim eul wihae bachin hachanh-eun geos-ilado geu lusdoem eobs-i jeongdanghan bosang-eul badnola
